pages.text: Unadushyire mubo wandikiye ibyiza kuri iyi si ndetse no ku munsi w’imperuka, rwose tukwicujijeho. (Allah) aravuga ati "Ibihano byanjye mbihanisha uwo nshaka kandi n’impuhwe zanjye zigera ku biremwa byose. (Izo mpuhwe) nzazigenera abatinya Allah, bakanatanga amaturo ndetse na babandi bemera ibimenyetso byacu

Abakurikira Intumwa (Muhamadi) ikaba n’umuhanuzi utari uzi gusoma no kwandika, basanga yanditswe mu bitabo byabo bya Tawurati n’Ivanjili. (Iyo ntumwa) ibabwiriza gukora ibyiza ikanababuza gukora ibibi, ibazirurira ibyiza ikanabaziririza ibihumanye, ibatura imitwaro ikanababohora ingoyi (y’amategeko) bari bariho. Bityo, babandi bamwemeye, bakamwubaha, bakamushyigikira bakanakurikira urumuri yahishuriwe (Qur’an), abo ni bo bakiranutsi

Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Yemwe bantu! Mu by’ukuri, njye ndi intumwa ya Allah yoherejwe kuri mwe mwese. (Allah) ni we ufite ubwami bw’ibirere n’isi. Nta yindi mana ibaho itari we, ni we utanga ubuzima akanatanga urupfu". Bityo, nimwemere Allah n’intumwa ye ikaba n’umuhanuzi utari uzi gusoma no kwandika, we wemera Allah akanemera amagambo ye, kandi munamukurikire kugira ngo mubashe kuyoboka
No mu bantu ba Musa harimo itsinda riyobora (abantu) rikoresheje ukuri, rikanagukoresha mu butabera
